{{Wireless embedded system |brand=EDUP |model=EP-9001 |asin=B06Y1W3TTK |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |fcc_date=09/11/2017 |fcc_id=2AMG8WT-RT8501 |type=wireless router |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7620A;MEDIATEK, MT7620A, 1651-BMTH, PTPBYC57H; |cpu1_cspeed=580 |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7620A;MEDIATEK, MT7620A, 1651-BMTH, PTPBYC57H; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi2_chip1_model=MT7612E;MEDIATEK, MT7612EN, 1652-BMAL, ETPBYF48; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=WIFI-XXXX, WIFI-XXXX-5G |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_pass=admin }}
:• '''867''' Mbps - 2SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''300''' Mbps - 2SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan.) = '''''1200 Mbps'' class'''
"800002186 V1.0" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. According to the [https://fccid.io/2AMG8WT-RT8501/Letter/Differences-Description-3555053 Differences Description] document on the FCC, :the following models are identical: * EP-2655 * EP-RT9001 * KW-RT6019 * WT-RT8501
